verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take my heart and help me feel Take my faith and make it real Take my eyes and let me see All the love surrounding me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Don’t let me go, Hold me close to where You are Don’t let me go, Take my heart, take all of me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take my loss and take my gain Take my trials and take my pain Take my life and let it be All that You would have for me{/lang-eng}
